We will get cash, you'll get some respect... sounds good? Talk to Knuckleduster, he'll give you the details.
Not really.
That's nothing. Go think about it, process it, then we'll talk.
Useful to you, if you want to end up high... interested in what I have to say?
Barge's PDA. I found his corpse in the cave under the burnt farm.
I found this near a skeleton, not far from Pineoak. I think it's Joker's PDA.
Joker ?!... It can't be... What is this crap?! ... It turns out that Joker is dead ... Ah, Joker, you didn't get the last laugh... Rest in peace ... I hope that that Barge's all right ...
Joker ?!... It can't be ... What is this crap?! ... First Barge dies, then Joker... Ah, Joker, you didn't get the last laugh... Rest in peace... And Barge ... How did it happen...
Barge's and Joker's. I found one near the Pineoak and a skeleton, the other - on a dead body in the caves under the burnt farm.

To be honest, there is little to say about it. It is extremely dangerous and lethal. Starts slowly, its first sign is a change in the weather... but it's easy to miss. When you see a blowout coming or hear about it from stalkers, it's essential to find a shelter, a cave or something made from concrete, bricks or steel. I am one of the few stalkers that can feel it approach, my back aches like hell when it does. I wish I could tell you more about how it works, but I simply do not know.
Looking for gear? Information? Or maybe you want to sell me something?
Sultan said that you want to attack the stalkers. I'm with you.
Excellent. Head to Shevchenko at midnight, we'll be waiting for you. Do not waste time needlessly.
A, bro... Well, did you figure something out with Sultan?
Well yar... head to the barge after midnight, but before dawn. We'll be waiting for you.
I think I'll stay with you, wait till midnight. Then you can show me the way to the Shevchenko.
I'll stay. It won't be a problem to hit the barge.
I'll see you there, have some stuff to do in the meantime.

I have a few major clients outside the Zone. From time to time, they order specific artifacts and give me a deadline. Bring me an artifact, you get paid good money. Now, just remember - these orders are very important to me, so I hire several stalkers, and only the first one gets paid in full.
A burned-out farmhouse. Hmm ... And what do you want with those?

The place is also called Iron Forest. The helicopter crashed into the power line towers and it seems no soldiers survived the crash. Even if they did, they wouldn't get out. Poltergeists react to movement and the ones there are particularly nasty, electrocuting any trespasser.

Listen, after the helicopter crashed, five soldiers were seen climbing out of the swamp. No, it's not difficult, just remember to avoid water and jump over any suspicious bumps. Oh, and bring chemical protection. I can sell you some, if you want to head there.

Oh, you didn't see Joker or Barge, by chance?... they my friends... it would be neat... we were like brother to each other, like rocks on a mountain... how could we let this happen?... I'm here... and they... nowhere to be seen...
Tell me about Joker and Barge.
I have something for you.
So say something already, what do you have for me?
All is clear now. I know him, he's a slick, brazen boy, who thinks stalkers are cows that can be milked... we should give him a lesson.
Get information from the mercenary camp. It's not as difficult as it seems.
I will await you return. Remember, this is a priority order, we have two days to complete it.
PDA of Sultan's messenger.
Not that interesting. I'll give you 500.
Agreed.
Detector prototypes. Want to buy them back?
I found secret documents in the convoy, at the old bridge. Want to see?
A strange artifact, I found it on the dredger.
A strange artifact. I found it near Yanov.
The Heart of the Oasis.
Let's go.
Wait.
You are going to be attacked by a group of bandits, better stay alert.
Bastards! They will get a warm welcome now... listen, if it's possible, try to gain their trust. Find out the details and then we can fight them off. We owe you big time.
I don't care who was going to get them, give them all!
Alright, take it.
You don't know? We want the stuff, give it all here, loser!
Hey, chill... Here, take this.
Bastards! They will get a warm welcome now... listen, if it's possible, help us fight them off. We owe you big time.
Yes, we owned them! Except for you, you moron, fuck you, you don't get a cut for doing nothing. Now get out, and come back only if you manage to somehow get another job.
You were about as helpful as a jug of goat milk. Now, listen, I can't give you a reward for doing nothing.
Later.

Perfect! Now we have us a delicate situation. I heard that Beard gave his stalkers some cool detectors to find rare artifacts... we should roll over them and get those detectors for our boys. You dig?
No dice, I can't help it. I tried to hit his trade channels and supply lines, but the bearded bastard still got the Compass somehow... he has all the cards... for now.
[more ...]
[more ...]
[more ...]
Glouchar is dead. It seems he was killed by Tremor, who is dead too, by the way.
